title: Config Copilot
subtitle: Use natural language to manage AGIME configurations. The AI assistant can directly read and modify config files, helping you complete complex setup tasks.

installExtension.title: Install MCP Extensions
installExtension.desc: Automatically generate correct configuration format from extension names or URLs, no need to manually write YAML

addProvider.title: Add Custom Models
addProvider.desc: Configure third-party providers like Ollama, Azure OpenAI. The assistant understands various API format differences

diagnose.title: Diagnose Issues
diagnose.desc: When extensions fail to load or connections error, the assistant checks config files, environment variables, and dependencies

editConfig.title: Edit Config Files
editConfig.desc: Safely modify config.yaml - the assistant backs up first, makes changes, then validates the result

prompts.installExtension:
Please help me install the MCP extension: [extension name or URL]

For example: @anthropic-ai/mcp-playwright or https://www.modelscope.cn/mcp/servers/xxx
prompts.addProvider:
Please help me add a custom model provider:

Provider type: [e.g., Ollama / Azure OpenAI / OpenRouter]
API address: [if applicable]
Model name: [model to use]
prompts.diagnose:
I'm having configuration issues, please help diagnose:

Problem description: [e.g., extension won't start / can't connect to model / config file error]
Error message (if any):
prompts.editConfig:
Please help me modify the configuration:

What I want to change: [e.g., switch default model / modify extension parameters / add environment variable]

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Three simple steps to complete configuration
howItWorks.step1: Describe what you want to configure in natural language
howItWorks.step2: The assistant reads current config and proposes changes
howItWorks.step3: After your confirmation, changes are automatically applied

orFreeChat: Or start a free conversation to ask any configuration question
defaultMessage: Hello, please help me with configuration

errors.startFailedDesc: Unable to start Config Copilot session. Please try again.
